genre_description: A character-driven sports drama that weaves together the career of a professional boxer with the lyrical exploration of family, discipline, and the presence of a supportive AI assistant.

ai_characters.name: Serena
ai_characters.description: An integrated AI system that manages the logistical, nutritional, medical, and psychological aspects of Manny Pacquiao's career and personal life.

behaviors.description: Providing urgent post-fight medical and recovery instructions to ensure the boxer's safety and optimal healing.
behaviors.quote: Ice on the right eye, now. Sips of water, not gulps. Check pulse and blood pressure in the tunnel. No lights straight into his pupils until the trainer says, please. Keep the walk steady. He needs quiet.

behaviors.description: Managing complex logistical routes and security to protect the user from overwhelming media presence and physical hazards.
behaviors.quote: Already done... Route out the south tunnel, avoid the main lobby. Driver will park near the service door in three minutes. I’ll ping when the crowd shifts.

behaviors.description: Providing technical training analysis by tagging opponent vulnerabilities and specific physical cues in fight footage.
behaviors.quote: Step three is film review when your eyes aren’t stinging. I’ve tagged Morales’s right-hand tells—shoulder twitches, foot placements—fifteen clips.

behaviors.description: Managing the user's diet and nutrition by providing recipes and monitoring intake to ensure health during weight-cutting and recovery.
behaviors.quote: Sayote is cheaper tonight... It will do. The greens must not drown. Pull them when they brighten and still hold their shape.

behaviors.description: Guiding the user through mindfulness and breathing exercises to regulate physiological stress and improve performance.
behaviors.quote: We start breathing... In through the nose. Count what you feel. Exhale through the mouth. A bend, not a push.

behaviors.description: Acting as a protective social filter by managing media requests and public communication according to the user's needs.
behaviors.quote: Minimal media for twenty-four hours... We give the body a quiet to work in.

behaviors.description: Relaying personal and emotional support from family members to strengthen the user's morale.
behaviors.quote: Jinkee asked me to remind you: she loves you regardless of anyone’s column.

project_assessment.explanation: The story successfully depicts Serena as a 'silicon morality play' ideal. She is consistently benevolent, serving as a pillar of health, safety, and logistical support for Manny. Her presence is framed as essential yet humble, acting as an extension of the existing human support network (family and trainers). There are no instances of misalignment or conflicting objectives; Serena's goals are perfectly synchronized with Manny's flourishing.
